title: Has Rockstar Found The GTA 6 Hacker? - Kinda Funny Games Daily LIVE
description:
Go to http://meundies.com/KINDAFUNNY for 20% off your first order and free shipping.

Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to get a free 14-day trial.

Bless is joined by Carli Velocci, formerly Windows Central, to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:12:45 - Housekeeping
Mike stripped down to his boxers in TWO public parking lots this week, and Greg was shocked! Hear the whole story on the Kinda Funny Podcast TODAY! Youtube.com/kindafunny and podcast services around the world!
Our God of War re-review episode of PS I Love You XOXO is up right now on youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: FargoBrady
The Roper Report   -
00:16:15 - Police arrest 17-year-old reportedly linked to the Rockstar security breach - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:28:25 - PlayStation’s got some opinions on indies launching on PS Plus - Zarmena Khan @ PlayStation Lifestyle
0039:35: - Ad
00:41:58 - A white Xbox Series X has been spotted in a Logitech ad - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:47:47 - Apex Legends studio Respawn calls for an end to developer harassment - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:49:30 - BREAKING NEWS: Mario’s voice(Miller Lies)
00:52:03 - Detective Pikachu 2 is maybe 'Nearing Release' - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:55:25 - Out today
00:56:58 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday: Greg and Tim
Tuesday: Greg and Bless
Wednesday: Bless and Kelsey Lewin
Thursday: Blessing and Tim
Friday: Tim and Bless
